channel.title: Any way around JAG?
channel.description: So I've been trying to get back into my account for like a week now, got a new PC since then sadly. Completely forgot when I formatted my old HDD that the pic with all my JAG answers was on it. I can get past one question (which is the secondary e-mail one) but one question is what are the last four characters of my drivers license, which I have no clue what that is because if I put in the actual four characters it's wrong.. I read somewhere that recovering your account does the trick, still no luck. Any help? Or am I just 100% screwed..

item.title: Any way around JAG?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

For anyone wondering, the Jagex customer service was extremely helpful and was able to help me solve my issue with getting my account back. They respond within an hour if you just fill out everything properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Any way around JAG?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“4x4Chevrolet, post:5, topic:525165”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=643856.msg4333512#msg4333512 date=1373999188]
Aren’t you supposed to put answers that you can easily remember but others can’t? Same for recovery questions.
[/quote]
Yeah… When I set these questions I didn’t even have a license so there’s no telling what I put for that… I thought I’d be fine just keeping that picture on my computer but, forgot about it when I resorted… So, I know I’m not very smart for not setting memorable questions and answers, but it’s too late now.[/quote]
Should have printed it and put it on your refrigerator.

Read full topic

item.title: Any way around JAG?

item.description:

3lv3n snip3r:

Aren’t you supposed to put answers that you can easily remember but others can’t? Same for recovery questions.

Yeah… When I set these questions I didn’t even have a license so there’s no telling what I put for that… I thought I’d be fine just keeping that picture on my computer but, forgot about it when I resorted… So, I know I’m not very smart for not setting memorable questions and answers, but it’s too late now.

item.title: Any way around JAG?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Yeah I shoulda gone through the customer support forum for this info… I googled it and everyone’s answer was “oh nooes you’re screwed”, guess I shoulda done a bit more research before posting.

RuneScape

RuneScape Forum - Community Forums for Clans, Feedback & Discussion

Join the discussion on the official RuneScape forum. Share your thoughts with the community, ask questions, find help, learn about events and much more.

The link for anyone googling this in the future, this is probably the only way to have a chance at getting it back. I’ll let you all know if I actually do get it back, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Any way around JAG?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

4x4Chevrolet:

So I’ve been trying to get back into my account for like a week now, got a new PC since then sadly. Completely forgot when I formatted my old HDD that the pic with all my JAG answers was on it. I can get past one question (which is the secondary e-mail one) but one question is what are the last four characters of my drivers license, which I have no clue what that is because if I put in the actual four characters it’s wrong… I read somewhere that recovering your account does the trick, still no luck. Any help? Or am I just 100% screwed…

Send Jagex a report saying that trying to use the recovery for JAG won’t work correctly and that you can provide all the information needed.

Read full topic
